string-array.name: preliminary_statements
string-array.item: Hi there!\nI can assist you in having a quick COVID-19 test if you like.\nAll information supplied here is private to you.
Hello to you!\nThis platform affords you an opportunity to take a quick test on the COVID-19 virus\nRemember your privacy is protected.
Hi, How are you doing today?\nI would like to help you through a quick COVID-19 test.\nAll information passed here is private to you only.
Hello!\nI am here to assist you in taking a quick COVID-19 test. \nYour privacy is well protected and all information supplied here is exclusive to you alone.

string-array.name: keep_taking_precautionary_steps
string-array.item:
Okay. Keep up the good work and continue practising the precautionary methods!
Keep safe!

Type "test" to start a new test

You are helping to save the planet by practising these precautionary measures. Keep it up!
Remain safe!

Type "test" to start a new test

Please kindly continue practicing these precautionary measures.
Be an ambassador and spread information on how to reduce the spread of COVID-19
COVID-19 would be defeated!
Keep safe

Start a new test by sending "test".

string-array.name: poor_precautionary_steps
string-array.item:
You are not taking enough precautionary measures and hence placing yourself at a high risk of getting infected.

Kindly ensure that you change and start observing the following precautionary measure(s):

You are at a higher risk of getting infected with COVID-19 as you are not taking enough precautionary measures.

Ensure that you adhere to the following precautionary measure(s):

You are highly likely to be exposed to contracting the virus as you're not taking enough precautionary measures.

Please practice the following preventive measure(s):

string-array.name: test
string-array.item:
Health is wealth!

Type "test" to start a new test.

Click the button below to see a list of the closest primary health care centres to you.

Stay safe!

Start a new test by sending "test".

Click the button below to see a list of the closest primary health care centres to you.

Be safe!

Start a new test by sending "test".

Click the button below to see a list of the closest primary health care centres to you.

string-array.name: fair_precautionary_steps
string-array.item:
You are doing well but you can also do so much more.

In addition, practice the following precautionary measure(s):

Our ability to stop the spread lies on us taking much more precautions.

Ensure you also practice the following precautionary measure(s):

You and your loved ones would be much safer if you practice all the precautionary measures.

The following precautionary measure(s) should also be a part of you:

string-array.name: r_take_test_statements
string-array.item: Would you like to take a quick COVID-19 test?
Take a Diagnosis Test on COVID-19?
Can we kick-start the COVID-19 test?

string-array.name: c_precautionary_measures_question
string-array.item: Are you observing any of the following precautionary measure(s)?
Do you maintain proper hygiene by observing any of these precautionary measure(s)?
Select some of the measure(s) you have adopted during the COVID-19 outbreak
To prevent infection and to slow transmission of COVID-19, which of the following do you do?

string-array.name: c_precautionary_measures_adopted
string-array.item: Consistent washing of hands with soap under running water
Covering your mouth and nose when coughing or sneezing.
Refraining from smoking and other activities that weakens the lungs

string-array.name: info_statements
string-array.item:
The COVID-19 virus affects different people in different ways.
COVID-19 is a respiratory disease and most infected people will develop mild to moderate symptoms and recover without requiring special treatment.
People who have underlying medical conditions and those over 60 years old have a higher risk of developing severe disease and death (WHO).

Send "test" to start a test

You can take the test at any time.
Stay up to date with information on COVID-19 by checking the homepage.
Stay safe!

You can always start a test by typing and sending "test".

Chat with you some other time.
Kindly ensure you:
Maintain social distance of at least 2 metres.
Wash your hands regularly.
Sanitize your hands with alcohol based sanitizers.

Stay Safe!

Send "test" to start a new test

Okay. Maybe some other time.
Practice proper hygiene and maintain recommended social distance
Please stay at home if you are a non-essential staff
For more info on Covid-19, check the front page.

Be Safe!

Send "test" to start a test

For more info on COVID-19, check the dashboard on the homepage.
Stay safe!

Send "test" to take the diagnosis test at any time.

The COVID-19 virus spreads primarily through droplets of saliva or discharge from the nose when an infected person coughs or sneezes, so itâ€™s important that you also practice respiratory etiquette (for example, by coughing into a flexed elbow) (WHO).

Be Safe!

Send "test" to start a test

The best way to prevent and slow down COVID-19 transmission is to be well informed about the COVID-19 virus, the disease it causes and how it spreads.
Protect yourself and others from infection by washing your hands or using an alcohol based rub frequently and not touching your face (WHO).

Send "test" to start a new test

Be Safe!

Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by a newly discovered coronavirus.
If you are not a health worker or an essential staff, kindly stay at home and avoid crowded areas.

Stay Safe!

Send "test" to start a test

string-array.name: r_nursing_sickness
string-array.item: Are you currently nursing any sickness?

string-array.name: c_symptoms_statements
string-array.item: Are you experiencing any of the following Symptoms?
Do you have any of the following symptoms?
Which of the following symptoms are you experiencing?

string-array.name: r_prior_illness_statements
string-array.item: Have you had any prior respiratory illness?
Have you had any respiratory problems in the past?
Have you suffered from any fever related illness before?

string-array.name: c_previous_symptoms_duration
string-array.item: How long did your last illness last?
How long did the symptoms last?
How long did the previous symptoms last?

string-array.name: c_current_symptoms_duration
string-array.item: How long has these current symptoms lasted?
How long has these present symptoms persisted?
How long have you been experiencing these present symptoms?

string-array.name: r_travel_statements
string-array.item: Did you visit any of the high risk countries in the past 14 days?
Did you visit any country with confirmed COVID-19 cases of recent?
Have you recently visited any country with confirmed cases of COVID-19?
Were you in close contact with anyone that recently travelled to a country with confirmed COVID-19 cases?

string-array.name: r_state_travel_statements
string-array.item: Have you travelled to an state of recent?
Did you visit any state in the last 14 days?
Have you recently visited any state with confirmed cases of COVID-19?
Were you in close contact with anyone that recently travelled to a state with confirmed COVID-19 cases?
Did you go on any inter-state journey of late?

string-array.name: ncdc_contact_statements
string-array.item:
Contact The Nigerian Centre for disease Control (NCDC):

Phone: 080097000010
SMS: 08099555577
Whatsapp: 07087110839
Fb/Twitter: @NCDCgov
Email: info@ncdc.gov.ng

Not satisfied? Take the test again by sending "test".

Kindly contact the closest primary health care centres for advice.

Contact NCDC:
Phone: 080097000010
SMS: 08099555577
Whatsapp: 07087110839
Fb/Twitter: @NCDCgov
Email: info@ncdc.gov.ng

Not satisfied? Test again by sending "test".

Get Tested to know your status by contacting NCDC via:

Phone: 080097000010
SMS: 08099555577
Whatsapp: 07087110839
Fb/Twitter: @NCDCgov
Email: info@ncdc.gov.ng

Not satisfied? you can take the test again by sending "test".

string-array.name: phc_contact_statements
string-array.item: Contact the closest primary health care center to you to get proper medical help.\n\n
Go to the closest hospital or clinic to get tested and treated.\n\n
Kindly visit the nearest Health centre closest to you to get tested.\n\n

string-array.name: r_retest_statements
string-array.item: Would you like to take another test?
Not satisfied? you can take the test again.

string-array.name: yes_at_home
string-array.item: Kindly remain at home if you are not an essential worker as your obedience helps to flatten the COVID-19 curve.
That is good!\nAvoiding social gathering and staying back home helps to reduce community transmission of the virus.
Staying at home reduces chances of community spreading.

string-array.name: no_at_home
string-array.item: Are you above 60 years of age?

string-array.name: no_below_60
string-array.item:
Staying away from crowded areas reduces the likelihood of community transmission.
If you are not an essential staff, please stay at home.
If you must go out, use a face mask to protect yourself and those around you.
If you are not a health worker or an essential staff, kindly stay at home as you have a high chance of contracting the virus or spreading it.\n
Most COVID-19 patients usually show little or no symptoms.\nIt is therefore advised that you avoid social gatherings and remain at home if you are a non-essential staff.\n

string-array.name: yes_above_60
string-array.item: You have a higher chance of getting infected with the virus and due to your age, your immune system might not be strong enough to fight the virus if infected.\nKindly remain at home and avoid social gatherings.\n
Statistics has shown a high fatality rate within your age group as a result of a weak immune system.\nIt is therefore advised that you stay at home and avoid social gatherings.\n
A high mortality rate has been observed with people within your age group.\nHowever, avoiding social gatherings and staying at home reduces the risk of contracting the virus.\n

string-array.name: title_comments
string-array.item: Interact with the health chat platform and get instant diagnosis and recommendation
Get an updated statistics of COVID-19 both locally and around the world
Populates the cloud firestore database with updated data
Get answers to pertinent questions on COVID-19
List of credible web sources on the COVID-19 pandemic
Follow recommended preventive measures to reduce risk of contracting the COVID-19 virus
Know the information sources and contact the development team

string-array.name: error_list
string-array.item: Please check internet connection and try again.
Unable to load page. No internet connection
Requires internet connection to get latest updates.
Please ensure that you enable your internet connection
Please ensure you have an internet connection.

resources.string: You must select an option from the list

This app provides detailed information and updates about the COVID-19 virus (Coronavirus) both locally and internationally. The information shown in these app are gotten from recommended health sources. Some of the sources of these information are listed in the section below.
